oai_dc:dc.dc:title: SI-R Codes for Computing Selection Indices in R
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Alvarado, Gregorio
Cerón, Jesús
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: International Maize and Wheat Improvement Center
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: SELECTION INDEX
SMITH INDEX
ESIM INDEX
R-project
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: SI is a collection of R codes to compute several selection indices. It comes together a powerpoint explanation of the indices and one example.
oai_dc:dc.dc:citation: Alvarado, Gregorio; Cerón, Jesús, 2015-08-14, "SI-R Codes for Computing Selection Indices in R", http://hdl.handle.net/11529/10352 nternational Maize and Wheat Improvement Center [Distributor] V3 [Version]
